title: 498 42 "Luffy Becoming an Apprentice?! A Man Who Fought Against the King of the Pirates!"Transliteration: "Rufi Deshi-iri!? Kaizoku-Ō to Tatakatta Otoko!" (Japanese:ルフィ弟子入り!?　海賊王と戦った男!) Takahiro Imamura Hirohiko Kamisaka May 15, 2011(2011-05-15)[248]
